shortDescription.shortDescription: In 2021 we worked with the Sloan Foundation to create the Open Hardware Creators in Academia Fellowship. This Fellowship was designed to have nine open source creators working within the world of academia come together to explore the ways that open source hardware is being used in their fields, find ways to engage other academics in openness, and give space for the fellows to work with mentors to expand their own knowledge.

childrenMarkdownRemark.html: In 2021 we worked with the Sloan Foundation to create the Open Hardware Creators in Academia Fellowship. This Fellowship was designed to have nine open source creators working within the world of academia come together to explore the ways that open source hardware is being used in their fields, find ways to engage other academics in openness, and give space for the fellows to work with mentors to expand their own knowledge.
